tasks.title: Verify conflict badge auto-fix accuracy
tasks.description: Test that single auto-fix and Fix All show accurate entry numbers in toasts
tasks.details:
Session 73E fixes (page.tsx:905-939, 1023-1033):
- Single auto-fix now calls renumberAllDays() before showing toast
- Fix All now calls renumberAllDays() and reports correct moved count
- Entry numbers in toast should match UI display after global renumbering

tasks.title: Fix conflict badge height to match notes/awards badges
tasks.description: Conflict badge currently w-8 h-6 but doesn't match trophy helper and studio note badges
tasks.details:
Current HTML shows:
- Conflict badge: w-8 h-6 (32px × 24px)
- Need to match trophy helper and studio note badge heights
- File: ScheduleTable.tsx (conflict badge wrapper)
- User reports: "still not the same size as notes and awards badges"

subtasks.title: Change wrapper div from inline-block to inline-flex items-center
subtasks.description: Line 398: className="relative inline-block" → className="relative inline-flex items-center"

subtasks.title: Test badge alignment on tester environment
subtasks.description: Use Playwright to verify all three badges (trophy, note, conflict) have same visual height

tasks.title: Fix day start time not updating first routine after drag
tasks.description: User changed Thursday start time to 10:00 AM, dragged routines to schedule, but first routine shows 8:00 AM instead of 10:00 AM. Day start time change not being applied to dragged routines.
